world

Class SimpleWorldFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.SimpleWorldFactory

  • public class SimpleWorldFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds SimpleObjects that can be added to a map by generated keys.
    Author:
    Brian Nakayama
    See Also:
    SimpleObject

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleWorldFactory() 
      SimpleWorldFactory(java.lang.String s)
      Create a SimpleWorldFactory with pre-registered SimpleObjects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addSimpleObject(int c, int x, int y, SimpleMap m)
      Add a SimpleObject using either the default constructor or an empty String using the getClone method.
      boolean addSimpleObject(int c, int x, int y, java.lang.String s, SimpleMap m)
      Add a SimpleObject using either the default constructor (if getClone returns null) or the getClone method with a String for customizing the SimpleObject.
      int getKey(SimpleObject o)
      Gets the current key being used for the class of a SimpleObject stored in the SimpleWorldFactory.
      java.util.List<SimpleObject> getList()
      Gets the list of SimpleObjects currently stored.

      Loads all of the compiled SimpleObject *.class files in a package with the directory URL.

      Get the image used by the object corresponding to the key.

      Registers all SimpleObjects in a list in order, replacing any previous objects registered.
      int size()
      Get the number of registered objects.
      java.lang.String toString()

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleWorldFactory

        public SimpleWorldFactory()

      • SimpleWorldFactory

        public SimpleWorldFactory(java.lang.String s)
        Create a SimpleWorldFactory with pre-registered SimpleObjects. The string should be generated using toString()
        Parameters:
        s - A String holding the canonical names of SimpleObjects separated by semicolons.

    • Method Detail

      • loadPackage

        public boolean loadPackage(java.lang.String directory)
        Loads all of the compiled SimpleObject *.class files in a package with the directory URL. This method will not load any inner classes.
        Parameters:
        directory - the URL of the package
        Returns:
        True if and only if all of the SimpleObject classes were registered as SimpleObjects.

      • register

        public boolean register(SimpleObject o)
        Registers a SimpleObject with a key.
        Parameters:
        o - The SimpleObject to add.
        See Also:
        SimpleObject

      • register

        public boolean register(java.lang.String o)
        Registers a SimpleObject with a key from a string holding the class name.
        Parameters:
        o - the class name to be registered.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the object was successfully registered.

      • registerReplace

        public void registerReplace(java.util.List<SimpleObject> o)
        Registers all SimpleObjects in a list in order, replacing any previous objects registered.
        Parameters:
        o - A List of SimpleObjects in order from key 0 to n.

      • previewKey

        public Img previewKey(int c)
        Get the image used by the object corresponding to the key.
        Parameters:
        c - The key.
        Returns:
        The image.

      • addSimpleObject

        public boolean addSimpleObject(int c,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      SimpleMap m)
        Add a SimpleObject using either the default constructor or an empty String using the getClone method.
        Parameters:
        c - The key for the SimpleObject.
        x - The x coordinate for the object.
        y - The y coordinate for the object.
        m - The map the object should be added to.
        Returns:
        True iff the object was added.

      • getList

        public java.util.List<SimpleObject> getList()
        Gets the list of SimpleObjects currently stored.
        Returns:
        The list of SimpleObjects

      • size

        public int size()
        Get the number of registered objects.
        Returns:

      • getKey

        public int getKey(SimpleObject o)
        Gets the current key being used for the class of a SimpleObject stored in the SimpleWorldFactory.
        Parameters:
        o - The SimpleObject to search for in the factory.
        Returns:
        The internal key of the object o. Returns -1 if o is not stored.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Use this method to get a String containing all of the SimpleObjects contained in this factory. Can be used to create an instance of SimpleWorldFactory
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        See Also:
        SimpleWorldFactory(String)

      • addSimpleObject

        public boolean addSimpleObject(int c,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      java.lang.String s,
                      SimpleMap m)
        Add a SimpleObject using either the default constructor (if getClone returns null) or the getClone method with a String for customizing the SimpleObject.
        Parameters:
        c - The key for the SimpleObject.
        x - The x coordinate for the object.
        y - The y coordinate for the object.
        m - The map the object should be added to.
        s - The String passed into the getClone method.
        Returns:
        True iff the object was added.
